articles.title: AI influencers allow brands to create the perfect persona, but is this what consumers want?
articles.content: Tens of thousands of likes, heart-eyed emojis and adoring comments pile up beneath each image. It all looks effortless: a fit, stylish 25-year-old documenting her daily life. Yet, Aitana cannot do any of these things, because she is not real. She is a hyper-realistic digital influencer generated using artificial intelligence (AI). Its representative Paula Garcia said: "Hyper-realistic AI influencers bring great versatility, as they can...

articles.title: 17-year-old teen arrested for armed robbery in Jurong
articles.content: A karambit knife has a short curved blade with a finger grip. He was identified through follow-up investigations and with the aid of police cameras. A mobile phone, gold ring, and a karambit were also recovered and seized as case exhibits. The teenager will be charged in court on Saturday.
